   dharmayuktānvidadhaddhārmikatvena tānniyamayannātmani svahṛdaye hārde	Darma yuktAn vidaDat DArmika tvena tAn niyamayan= Atmani sva hRdaye hArde
   brahmaṇi sarvendriyāṇi saṃpratiṣṭhāpyopasaṃhṛtyendriyagrahaṇātkarmāṇi ca	brahmaNi sarva indriyANi saMpratizWApya upasaMhRtya indriya grahaNAt karmANi ca
   saṃnyasyāhiṃsahiṃnsāṃ parapīḍāmakurvansarvabhūtāni sthāvarajaṅgamāni	saMnyasya ahiMsahiMnsAm para pIxAm akurvan sarva BUtAni sTAvara jaFgamAni
   bhūtānyapīḍayannityarthaḥ /	BUtAni apIxayan= iti arTaH /
   bhikṣānimittamaṭanādināpi parapīḍā syādityata āha anyatra tīrthebhyaḥ /	BikzA nimittam awana AdinA api para pIxA syAt iti atas Aha anyatra tIrTeByaH /
   tīrthaṃ nāma śāsrānujñāviṣayastato 'nyatretyarthaḥ /	tIrTam nAma SAsra anujQA vizayaH tatas anyatra iti arTaH /
   sarvāśramiṇāṃ caitatsamānam tīrthebhyo 'nyatrahiṃsaiveti /	sarva ASramiNAm ca etat samAnam tIrTeByaH anyatra hiMsA eva iti /
   anye varṇayanti kuṭumba evaitatsarvaṃ kurvansa khalvadhikṛto yāvadāyuṣaṃ	anye varNayanti kuwumbaH eva etat sarvam kurvan sa Kalu aDikRtaH yAvat Ayuzam
   yāvajjīvamevaṃyathoktena prakāreṇaiva	yAvajjIvam evaMyaTA uktena prakAreNa eva
   vartayanbrahmalokamabhisaṃpadyatedehānte /	vartayan brahma lokam aBisaMpadyatedeha ante /
   na ca punarāvartate śarīragrahaṇāya /	na ca punar Avartate SarIra grahaNAya /
   punarāvṛtteḥ prāptāyāḥ pratiṣedhāt /	punarAvRtteH prAptAyAH pratizeDAt /
   arcirādinā mārgeṇa kāryabrahmalokabhisaṃpadya	arciH AdinA mArgeNa kArya brahma loka BisaMpadya
   yāvadbrahmalokasthitistāvattatraiva tiṣṭhati prāktato nā'vartata ityarthaḥ	yAvat brahma loka sTitiH tAvat tatra eva tizWati prAk tatas nA avartate iti arTaH
   dvirabhyāsa upaniṣadvidyāparisamāptyarthaḥ //1 // //	dvis aByAse upanizad vidyA parisamApti arTaH //1 // //
   iti cchāndogyopaniṣadi aṣṭamādhyāyasya pañcadaśaḥ khaṇḍaḥ	iti cCAnda ugya upanizadi azwama aDyAyasya paQcadaSaH KaNxaH
   iti śrīmadgovindabhagavatpūjyapādaśiṣyaparamahaṃsapar	iti SrImat govinda Bagavat pUjya pAda Sizya parama haMsapar
   ivrājakācāryaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpādakṛtau cchāndogyopaniṣadvivaraṇe	ivrAjaka AcArya SrImat SaFkara Bagavat pAda kRtO cCAnda ugya upanizad vivaraNe
   aṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ	azwamaH aDyAyaH
